Text: Thank you so much!!! Will seed at least 1/1. Cheers!
Many thanks for this full version (incl the first scene with the dog, which was cut on the European release).

just a pity that the sound goes in and out of sync all through the movie, a good example of where it's out is the axe scene @ ~1:30:30

luckily I managed to find a flawless DVD9 (6.3GB) @ rutracker dot org
